pageProps.title: pic2phrase_bot: Photo Description Generator
pageProps.teaser: A bot that generates descriptions to submitted photos, in a human-like manner.

data.title: pic2phrase_bot: Photo Description Generator
data.slogan: A bot that generates descriptions to submitted photos, in a human-like manner.
data.description: pic2phrase_bot runs inside Telegram messenger and can be used to generate a phrase describing a submitted photo, employing computer vision, web scraping, and syntactic dependency analysis powered by spaCy.
data.author: Yuli Vasiliev
